general.accessDenied: sorry my friend, but you either ain't an admin or I really don't like you. Go away.

initGuild.success: successfully initialized or re-initialized guild in the database.

msgmove.syntaxHelp: the correct command is `msgmove <message ID> <#channel>` Example: `,mgsmove 448400100591403024 #somechannel`. The bost MUST have permission to manage messages in the channel.
msgmove.channelNotFound: the channel you specified was not found.

prefix.message: You can ping me directly or use the following prefix:

servertime.syntaxHelp: the correct command is `servertime` (displays current server time) or `servertime offset GMT`, `servertime offset +4`.
servertime.gmtOffsetNotSet: server GMT offset is not set. Please set your server's GMT offset by running $servertime offset <GMT|number>. Examples: `servertime offset -8`, `servertime offset +4`, `servertime offset GMT`.
servertime.incorrectOffset: incorrect offset. Correct syntax: `servertime offset -4` or `servertime offset GMT`
servertime.offsetSetFailure: failed to set offset. There has been an error and I am initiating self-destruct sequence.
servertime.firstRunHelp: please set the GMT offset for your guild first. Run `servertime offset <offset>`. Offset is between `-9` and `+14`, or simply `GMT` if your server runs in the UTC timezone.

t.syntaxHelp: the correct syntax is `t <2 letter language code> <text>` Example: `t ru Hello, asshat!`.
